title: Black Mountain La Cabra and Monstercross Frames Are on Sale
content:
Photo via Blue Lug

Coinciding with John’s Mod Zero review earlier this week, Black Mountain Cycles has lost its off-site frame storage building and has to move some frames, quick! Particularly the la Cabra model (above) and the beloved Monstercross V5.6 in larger sizes. Effective immediately, all La Cabra and Monstercross V5.6 (60cm, 62cm, and 64cm) frames are on sale with a significant discount.

Monstercross V5.6 frames – reg. $875, sale $675
La Cabra frames – reg. $1195, sale $875

Scoop up the savings at Black Mountain Cycles.
